author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Deepak Dixit for "Row submit not working on Inventory Transfers  screens." https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5228
Row submit not working for "Complete Requested Transfers" flow. It missed the use-row-submit="true"

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from  Leon for "Allow text data of agrement and its items accept "<" and ">" characters" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5209
It's common that an agreement text body contains those "special" characters.

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-863 - Enable stats for various caches used in Oak by default
Upgrading the Guava version to 14.0.1 which has fix for Guava usage of Unsafe [1]. It should allow stats collection on JDK other than Oracle/Sun

author: jmclean
msg: Added installer config file for version 3
